content.en: Engine optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize the performance of heavy-duty engines fueled with diesel and gasoline-like fuels. These algorithms, such as the Non-dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm II (NSGA II) and the genetic algorithm, are coupled with computational fluid dynamics (CFD) tools to find the best injection strategies and combustion chamber geometries that reduce emissions and improve fuel efficiency. By using these algorithms, scientists hope to develop more efficient and environmentally friendly engines.
content.da: Motoroptimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere ydeevnen af tunge motorer drevet med diesel og benzinlignende brændstoffer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Non-dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm II (NSGA II) og den genetiske algoritme, er koblet med beregningsmæssige væskedynamiske (CFD) værktøjer for at finde de bedste indsprøjtningsstrategier og forbrændingskammergeometrier, der reducerer emissioner og forbedrer brændstofeffektiviteten. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber forskerne at udvikle mere effektive og miljøvenlige motorer.
